title: Consume WCF as a Service Reference in UWP
body: We are migrating an application from Windows 8.1 to Windows 10. The first problem that we encountred is that in WinRT enables to add an Service Reference of WCF and in UWP is not yet implemented.

comments.body: The problem is raising when we need to create an Service Reference with a NetTcpBinding - "DnsEndpointIdentity is not supported".
